    <C1 extends Unit, C2 extends Unit>
    void
    CollisionInteractionMap.onCollision(Class<C1> collider, Class<C2> collidee, CollisionInteractionMap.CollisionHandler<C1,C2> handler)
    Adds a two-way collision interaction to this collection, i.e. the collision handler will be used for both C1 versus C2 and C2 versus C1.
